title: Magnum 500 Gallon Water Trailer
item_description:
Magnum 500 Gallon Water Trailer

  • Manufacturer: Magnum
  • Model Number: MWT0500
  • Serial Number: 055108
    • (No VIN/Serial Record on File with CA DMV)
  • Capacity: 500 Gallon

Note: Buyer will receive a Bill of Sale only 1-2 weeks after removal. A serial number was located on the trailer, and the serial number was submitted to DMV registration records, where no record was found with the California DMV. Therefore, the buyer will only receive a Bill of Sale/Receipt. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, transfer, fees, application for license plates, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they choose to obtain a title/VIN/License/registration and DMV requirements.
